autoclicker-fabric.gui.help.active: If enabled, it will use the options below to determine how to auto click
autoclicker-fabric.gui.help.spamming: When enabled, the key will press and release. You can adjust the speed below
autoclicker-fabric.gui.help.cooldown: When enabled, if a mob is detected, the button will tap in sync with the weapon cooldown.
autoclicker-fabric.gui.help.shield: When enabled, the button wonâ€™t tap if your shield is up.
autoclicker-fabric.gui.help.mob-mode: (Requires 'Respect Cooldown' to be enabled). When enabled, the button will only click if a mob is in direct line of sight.
autoclicker-fabric.gui.help.spam-speed: When 'spamming' is enabled, this setting controls the delay between clicks in ticks. 0 = off, 1+ = 1 tick delay.
autoclicker-fabric.gui.help.hud-enabled: Whether to enable the mod HUD
